Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: There has been no previous finding of a glycine substitution that is not associated with any obvious phenotype in homozygous individuals .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| any obvious phenotype |

Note: In this paragraph, "any obvious phenotype" is the closest phrase to a disease entity, as it implies an abnormal condition or disorder. However, it is not a specific disease but rather a general term for any condition that is noticeably different from the typical or normal state.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| a glycine substitution that is not associated with any obvious phenotype |

Note: In this paragraph, "a glycine substitution that is not associated with any obvious phenotype" is the valid disease entity, as it refers to a specific genetic variation that does not appear to cause any noticeable abnormal condition or disorder.
